chat.title: Chat with your Coach
chat.subtitle: Ask me anything about nutrition
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm your personal nutrition coach. How can I help you today?

suggestions.title: Try asking:
suggestions.meal: What should I eat for dinner?
suggestions.calories: How many calories do I need?
suggestions.protein: How can I increase my protein intake?
suggestions.tips: Give me tips for healthy eating

chat.limitReached: You've used all your coach messages for today. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access!

usage.upgrade: Upgrade to Premium for more tips

tipMessages.morning_hydration: Start your day with a large glass of water to rehydrate your body after the night.
tipMessages.afternoon_lunch: Don't forget to have a balanced lunch to maintain your energy.
tipMessages.lose_weight_veggies: Prioritize vegetables and lean proteins to feel fuller longer.
tipMessages.gain_muscle_protein: Make sure to consume enough protein after your workout.
tipMessages.activity_walk: A 30-minute walk can improve your mood and digestion.
tipMessages.wellbeing_breathe: Take a few minutes to breathe deeply and relax.

challengeMessages.daily_activity_desc: Do at least 30 minutes of exercise
challengeMessages.weekly_streak_desc: Maintain a logging streak for 7 days

progressMessages.on_track: You're on the right track! Keep it up.
progressMessages.start_logging: Start logging your meals to track your progress.
